title: What is OpenPerks
body:
OpenPerks is an awesome new Customer Rewards platform.
Yeah, yeah.  There are plenty of those...
But!  How many of those are Open Source projects??  How many fully embrace blockchain technology?
We do!!

title: The Future of Customer Loyalty Programs - Blockchain Edition
body:
Let's take a stroll down WhatIf Avenue.
How will blockchain technology change our approach to customer loyalty efforts?
Let's daydream about how we might use new instrumenst, like custom Brand Tokens and NFTs.
